scripts.js:concat: concat -o public/bundle.js source/locals/en.js source/locals/ru.js source/main.template.js source/index.js
scripts.js:bundle: npm run js:concat && npm run js:uglify
scripts.css:concat: concat -o public/prebundle.css source/styles/index.css source/styles/content.css source/styles/sidebar.css source/styles/icons.css source/styles/signature.css source/styles/media.css
scripts.css:bundle: npm run css:concat && npm run css:autoprefixer && npm run css:uglify && rm public/prebundle.css
scripts.start: npm run css:bundle && npm run js:bundle
